cooking_guide: Chop the cherry tomatoes and garlic finely.
Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add chopped garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Add kimchi and cherry tomatoes and cook until heated through, about 2-3 minutes.
Add cooked rice and stir-fry until heated through and combined with the kimchi and tomatoes, about 5 minutes.
Serve hot garnished with sesame seeds.
Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add diced potatoes and cook until slightly softened, about 5 minutes.
Add chopped garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Add dried alpaca meat and cook until heated through, about 5 minutes.
Serve hot with tortilla chips on the side.
Slice the bread loaf in half lengthwise.
In a small bowl, combine minced garlic, olive oil, rosemary, and salt.
Spread the mixture evenly over the cut surface of the bread.
Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the bread is toasted and the garlic mixture is fragrant.
